languages.text: When shooting in a burst, the trajectory deviation chance of the second and all subsequent shots in that burst is increased by the recoil value of the weapon.
languages.original_text: При стрельбе очередью шанс отклонения траектории второго и последующих выстрелов увеличивается на значение отдачи оружия.

traits.locale_text: When shooting in a burst, the trajectory deviation chance of the second and all subsequent shots in that burst is increased by the recoil value of the weapon.
When shooting in a burst, the trajectory deviation chance of the second and all subsequent shots in that burst is increased by the recoil value of the weapon.
When shooting in a burst, the hit chance of all shots after the first is reduced by the recoil parameter of the weapon.

languages.text: Al disparar en ráfaga, la probabilidad de desvío de trayectoria de todos los disparos a partir del segundo aumenta tanto como el valor de retroceso del arma.
languages.original_text: When shooting in a burst, the trajectory deviation chance of the second and all subsequent shots in that burst is increased by the recoil value of the weapon.

traits.locale_text: Al disparar en ráfaga, la probabilidad de desvío de trayectoria de todos los disparos a partir del segundo aumenta tanto como el valor de retroceso del arma.

languages.text: 进行连发射击时，首次射击之后的所有射击都会更容易偏离原本的弹道。弹道偏移几率等同于武器的后坐力，每开火一次便叠加一层。
languages.original_text: When shooting in a burst, the trajectory deviation chance of the second and all subsequent shots in that burst is increased by the recoil value of the weapon.

traits.locale_text: 进行连发射击时，首次射击之后的所有射击都会更容易偏离原本的弹道。弹道偏移几率等同于武器的后坐力，每开火一次便叠加一层。

languages.text: 連射で射撃する場合、連射の2発目以降の軌道逸脱率は武器の反動パラメータによって増加する。
languages.original_text: When shooting in a burst, the trajectory deviation chance of the second and all subsequent shots in that burst is increased by the recoil value of the weapon.

languages.text: Feuerst du eine Salve ab, erhöht sich die mögliche Flugbahnabweichung des zweiten und aller weiteren Schüsse der Salve um den Rückstoßwert der Waffe.

traits.locale_text: Feuerst du eine Salve ab, erhöht sich die mögliche Flugbahnabweichung des zweiten und aller weiteren Schüsse der Salve um den Rückstoßwert der Waffe.

languages.text: Lors d'un tir en rafale, les chances que le deuxième tir et tous les suivants dévient de la trajectoire initiale sont augmentées par le recul de l'arme.

traits.locale_text: При стрельбе очередью шанс попадания второго и последующего выстрелов уменьшается на показатель отдачи оружия.

languages.text: Seri atış yaparken ikinci ve sonrasındaki tüm atışların mermi yollarının sapma olasılığı, silahın geri tepme değeri ile artar.
